clinical_study.brief_title: Prospective, Multicenter Study of the Efficacy and Tolerance of Tacrolimus on Refractory Nephrotic Syndrome (RNS)

brief_summary.textblock: Exploring the efficacy and safety of Tacrolimus on refractory nephrotic syndrome ; Acquiring the experience of Tacrolimus on the treatment of refractory nephrotic syndrome in Chinese patients.

intervention.description: Started: 0.05-0.1mg/kg/d,divided into two daily dose at 12hr; the blood level:5-10ng/ml in induction phase;and 4-6ng/ml in maintenance phase;
